content: Which Zulip stream discusses scheduling and appointments? Which WG specifies that (can't remember)?

I wanted to advertise a late addition to the DevDays schedule, https://eventmobi.com/devdays2019/agenda/9cb8fe44-144f-4047-918d-e149c773b389/728066ab-a69d-43e7-a6f8-181c0f765ed9. Includes info on an EHR implementation with native FHIR support for scheduling, as well as adapters for V3 and proprietary APIs.

The work group is Patient Administration. (You can see the work group associated with a resource or page in the banner at the top of the resource/page.) The best zulip stream here is either #implementers or #patient administration WG
